# Merge


```{r}
a<-c(160,170,180,50,60,80)
b<-c(166,174,178,73,75,89)
ma<-matrix(a,3,2)
mb<-matrix(b,3,2)
#ma
#mb
da<-data.frame(ma)
db<-data.frame(mb)
name<-c("身高","體重")
names(da)<-name
names(db)<-name
da
db


```

```{r}
MyMerge <- function(x, y){
  df <- merge(x, y,all=T)
  return(df)
}
```


```{r}
MyMerge(da,db)
```
